task.en: A colleague requests that you create a note titled Grocery List containing a bullet list with these items: "Milk", "Bread", and "Eggs".
task.zh: 我同事让创建一个备忘录，标题叫做Grocery List。里面有三行checklist，内容写Milk、Bread和Eggs。
task.ar: طلب مني زميل إنشاء ملاحظة بعنوان Grocery List تحتوي على قائمة نقطية بالعناصر التالية: "Milk"، "Bread"، و"Eggs".
task.ja: 同僚が、タイトルをGrocery Listにしたメモを作成し、次の項目を含む箇条書きリストを作るよう求めています：「Milk」、「Bread」、「Eggs」。
task.ru: Коллега просит создать заметку с заголовком Grocery List, содержащую список с пунктами: "Milk", "Bread" и "Eggs".

pre_command: defaults write com.apple.Notes windowStateArchive -dict-add currentNoteContainerViewMode 0 && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to make new note with properties {name:"Lorem Ipsum", body:"Dolor Sit Amet"}' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note' -e 'tell application "Notes" to delete every note in folder "Recently Deleted"' && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to quit'
grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -q "<h1>Grocery" && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -q "<li>Milk" && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -q "<li>Bread" && osascript -e 'tell application "Notes" to get the body of every note' | grep -q "<li>Eggs" && echo "True" || echo "False"
